member.name: T:OPS.Obfuscator.Attribute.ObfuscateAnywayAttribute
member.summary: Add this to class members to obfuscate them anyway with a new name '_ObfuscateTo', although the settings did not allow to. For example if you do not want to obfuscate all public methods beside some specific.

member.name: T:OPS.Obfuscator.Attribute.NotObfuscatedCauseAttribute
member.summary: Do not use! Gets attached to not obfuscated members in developments builds.

member.name: T:OPS.Obfuscator.Attribute.DoNotObfuscateClassAttribute
member.summary: Add this to a Class, so the whole class with all its content will not get obfuscated! But still its Method Bodys (String Obfuscation, Random Code generation ...) To not obfuscate Method Bodys too, add an additional Attribute: DoNotObfuscateMethodBodyAttribute to the classes or the specific methods.

member.name: T:OPS.Obfuscator.Attribute.DoNotObfuscateMethodBodyAttribute
member.summary: Add this to an Class to skip obfuscation of all Method Bodys, or to an specific Method to skip its Method Body. String Obfuscation, Random Code generation, ... are part of the Method Body obfuscation.

member.name: T:OPS.Obfuscator.Attribute.DoNotRenameAttribute
member.summary: Add this to an Class, Field, Method, whatever and its name will not get renamed (obfuscated)!

member.name: T:OPS.Obfuscator.Attribute.DoNotUseClassForFakeCodeAttribute
member.summary: Add this to an Class, to disallow fake code adding! Or to disallow using the class to create new fake classes basing on it!
